name: ai-cost-optimizer
description: Multi-LLM cost optimizer with smart routing - CPU optimized
readme: AI Cost Optimizer - Intelligent LLM routing for cost efficiency. Automatically selects the most cost-effective model based on prompt complexity. Supports 40+ models across 8 providers.

env.description: Anthropic API key for Claude models
Google AI API key for Gemini models
Cerebras API key for Llama models
OpenRouter API key for multi-provider access
Enable Python unbuffered output for better logging

volumes.description: Persistent storage for SQLite database and logs

notes: At least one provider API key must be configured for the service to function
The service will automatically enable providers based on available API keys
Database is stored in /data volume and persists across restarts
Default budget can be overridden per user via API
Supports both local (Ollama) and cloud providers
